text.the-gloria-hallelujah-font-is: The font "Gloria Hallelujah" is made by Kimberly Geswein (© 2010,

text.project-fasa-description1: Project F.A.S.A. is a first person shooter. The goal is to walk through the level until the final boss while killing different ennemies.
text.project-fasa-description2: Contribute on the final boss mechanics
text.little-plant-description1: Little Plant is a third person game where you play as a seed that has to plant itself to become a little plant and progress through the level. The goal is to accomplish quests.
text.rocketwiki-description1: RocketWiki is a 2D game. You have to collect different books containing snippets of Wikipedia pages and find the right title between a set of possible answer. Extracts and proposals are retrieved randomly from the Wikipedia API.
text.rocketwiki-description2: The connection with the Wikipedia API
text.jamclown-description1: JamClown is a 3D game made for the Nintendo DS. The goal is to exclude the pinguin from the production chain and to make the maximum amount of points in the allotted time.
text.jamclown-description2: Use the libnds library to code on the Nintendo DS
text.info: Currently looking for a full-time end-of-studies internship or position starting March 2, 2026
